23.post_text: Mark your calendars for 12 days of great offers from 1 - 12 December. #12daysofgifting

comments.message: Cheryl Loh Jeanie Hue Gerard Ong its hereee!

Getting a little -sian- about Starbucks Singapore releasing "limited cards" which require minimal topup (up to $50) within such a short while. Previously, some mini cards and diaries are usually few months apart, giving us time to breathe.

Right now, my case for example.. I had to top up 3x $10 for the new Xmas cards, then 2x $50 for the keychains..and now there's another mini card on this 12 Days promotion which requires another $50 topup.. That's $180 for 2 months. And diary promotion is going to return soon, which possibly means another $80. That's...$240 for within 2.5 worth of promotion.

I have been a long time Starbucks fan, even after I stopped getting the coffee. But I'm really starting to feel that these promotions are getting too frequent.

I understand that it's my choice to be collecting merchandise, so this just meant as a feedback (not complaint!)...and wondering if anyone else feels the same?

Hi Johnson, 梁淑芬, Amelia, Suzanne, Estella, and Kean Kar Khor, 

We are in the midst of delivering your Gold Cards, you will be receiving them any time from now till 15 Dec. Please do keep a look out for your Card in the mailbox, as you will be receiving them anytime soon. 

Meanwhile, please note that you can actually still use any of your existing Cards registered under your account to accumulate Stars and enjoy your Gold member benefits and rewards. In this case, you can use your existing Cards to purchase our Christmas merchandise and packaged coffee at 20% off. The program that we are using right now recognises your accounts instead of your Cards.

Hi Sebastian, 

In our new program, with a minimum spending of $300 a year, you will be recognised as a Gold member. With each membership level, you will enjoy different offers and benefits just for you. :)

I think the change has been poorly executed. You are advertising "20% off all Christmas merchandise and packaged coffee from 25 - 30 November".

Yet your email mailer states we will only be receiving the card between 17 November to 15 December. I don't think this is fair to your loyal fans.
